result.name: Fixed Version of Pixel City - Roblox
result.description: This is the fixed version of the original, modified with my updated base code. Browser Warning: The cost of keeping the quality and speed is that it won't appear on Microsoft Edge, a price that I'm willing to pay, switch to any other major browser, copy the CSS code and put into the stylus chrome extension to minimize lag that may be present due to it being animated. All credits go to >Kenze Wee - the creator of the artwork< and >Faetalic<, for the colour choices. This code was created by me, do give feedback for improvements in the comments. If you want more fixed roblox styles just click BoopBop at the top, or you can click DittoDino below for some mediocre youtube progressbars.
result.notes: This is the Alt of DittoDino. Disclaimers: Tablets/iPads or phones won't work, Chrome & Opera are the only browsers that work well with the extension. Press 'Read more' for further help. Help Sections Links Below. English Help Section. Turkish Translated Help Section - Yardım bölümü Türkçe'ye çevrildi. French Translated Help Section - Section d'aide traduite en français - cliquez ici. Russian/Cyrillic Translated Help Section - Русский/кириллица переведенный раздел помощи - кликните сюда. Spanish Translated Help Section - Sección de ayuda traducida al español - haga clic aquí. The original theme was this Pixel City. It's a link. 15 August 2022 - Released. 18 August 2022 - A now working but unstable avatar background was added which means it sometimes appears, sometimes doesn't, you can refresh your page multiple times to see if it'll appear. 26 August 2022 - Actually made it slower and a wee bit less blurry in my spare time, sorry for telling you that it couldn't be fixed, I just hadn't found the way back then. 14 October 2022 - The quality has been increased even further, though, at the cost of smooth speed, I'll change it back to a lower quality but smoother speed if there is overwhelming support for better speed. 17 April 2023 - Revamped style with new base code. 15 August 2023 - 1st anniversary, thanks for 26k installs. 16 August 2023 - Notifications are visible again.
